name: Matter Mover
description:
Welcome to Matter Mover! In this game you must move objects around to maneuver the map! First you'll have to climb onto the tower to get the plank. Place it over the car wreckage so you can get over onto the bridge. To win, you have to destroy the enemy's tower by throwing something really heavy at it with your matter manipulating powers!

Eric Margadonna - Sprint 4 - IT201009 - December 2021
